channel.title: CVE Feed for IDRIX, Truecrypt -- Veracrypt, Truecrypt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDRIX, Truecrypt -- Veracrypt, Truecrypt

item.title: CVE-2019-1010208|2024-08-05T03:07:18.517Z -- idrix%2C%20truecrypt -- veracrypt%2C%20truecrypt
item.description: IDRIX, Truecrypt Veracrypt, Truecrypt Prior to 1.23-Hotfix-1 (Veracrypt), all versions (Truecrypt) is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: Minor information disclosure of kernel stack. The component is: Veracrypt NT Driver (veracrypt.sys). The attack vector is: Locally executed code, IOCTL request to driver. The fixed version is: 1.23-Hotfix-1.
